name: Vide Infra Group
tag_list: web-development, web-design, nearshore-development, e-commerce, visualization, 3d, web-2-0, php, lamp, cms, content-management, web-application, web-systems, it-solutions, usability, latvia, australia
overview:
Vide Infra Group develop integrated web solutions and creative designs for global clients.

Full-cycle, ground-zero development and support services. Wide range of projects: creative and marketing websites, intranets, extranets, portals, custom business solutions, financial systems, BPM, e-commerce.

Vide Infra Group uses combination of technology, design and business skill to produce very effective and cost-efficient results. Strong emphasis on exceptional quality and innovation. Vide Infra Group develop stylish, simple-to-use web applications that help people achieve their goals faster with a little fun along the way. Focus on simplicity, innovation, and ease of use.
